locations.Name: Robot Bar
locations.Description: Quirky bar decorated with robots, offering sake, Asian beers and bar snacks, plus an Anime club.

locations.Name: Eden-Bar
locations.Description: Modern nightclub with large dance floor, laser lights and popular DJs, plus private booths for hire.

locations.Name: Spice Market
locations.Description: Vibrant, subterranean bar and nightclub with exotic Middle Eastern decor, live DJs and meze plates.

locations.Name: Ms Collins
locations.Description: Hip club offering street food from acclaimed chefs, weekly hip-hop and DJ nights, plus a barbershop
